title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!
author: Adi Tantimedh

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch
description: In today's BCTV Daily Dispatch: James Gunn/DCU/Superman/Henry Cavill, Superman & Lois, SNL, The Sandman, The Nevers/#Westworld & tons more!
author: Ray Flook

title: Samuel L. Jackson to Star in Tulsa King Spinoff NOLA King at Paramount+
description: Paramount+ already has Rocky Balboa; now they’re adding Nick Fury. Samuel L. Jackson has signed on to star in NOLA King, a new spinoff of the streamer’s Sylvester Stallone-led series Tulsa King, according to our sister site Deadline. Jackson will reportedly play Russell Lee Washington Jr., who hails from the crime underworld just like Stallone’s […]
author: Dave Nemetz

title: Casting News: Jonathan Jackson’s GH Exit, Paige Quits Summer House and More
description: Nine months after his celebrated Port Charles homecoming, Jonathan Jackson is once again exiting ABC’s General Hospital and the role of Lucky Spencer. The five-time Daytime Emmy winner’s final airdate is sometime next week. “We were so glad Jonathan was able to reprise the role of Lucky, even if it was for a limited time,” […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich
